focusAreas.title: Little Universe
focusAreas.description: We build products for amazing impact-focused organizations and businesses. We employ trust-driven agile practices to build and scale beautiful, accessible technology that drives momentum for causes that matter.

focusAreas.title: Parts
focusAreas.description: Realize your vision in half the time with custom components. Best in class responsive and accessible components, customized to your app and UX, so that you can focus on your specialty.

focusAreas.title: Tend Labs
focusAreas.description: We partner with founders to ship critical-path product. We work together to materialize vision, plan roadmaps, write code to scale up and move fast. Zero to one.
